item.mpalib.battery_basic.desc: Integrate a battery to allow the item to store energy.
item.mpalib.battery_advanced.desc: Integrate a more advanced battery to store more energy.
item.mpalib.battery_elite.desc: Integrate a the most advanced battery to store an extensive amount of energy.
item.mpalib.battery_ultimate.desc: Experimental high end power storage device, now with almost no chance of exploding (we think). Despite nasty rumors, it is not based on stolen alien technology.
tooltip.mpalib.changeModes: Change modes: Press and hold the number of the hotbar slot the PowerFist is in.
tooltip.mpalib.noModules: No installed modules! This item is useless until you add some modules at a Tinker Table.
item.mpalib.component_wiring.desc: A special type of wiring with high voltaic capacity and precision, necessary for the sensitive electronics in power armor.
item.mpalib.component_solenoid.desc: Wires wound around a ferromagnetic core produces a basic electromagnet.
item.mpalib.component_servo.desc: A special type of motor which uses a pulse-modulated signal to enact very precise movements.
item.mpalib.component_glider_wing.desc: A lightweight aerodynamic wing with an electromagnet for quick deployment and retraction.
item.mpalib.component_ion_thruster.desc: Essentially a miniature particle accelerator. Accelerates ions to near-light speed to produce thrust.
item.mpalib.component_parachute.desc: A simple reusable parachute which can be deployed and recovered in midair.
item.mpalib.component_field_emitter.desc: An advanced device which directly manipulates electromagnetic and gravitational fields in an area.
item.mpalib.component_laser_emitter.desc: A multicoloured laser array which can cheaply alter the appearance of something.
item.mpalib.component_carbon_mMyofiber.d: A small bundle of carbon fibers, refined for use in artificial muscles.
item.mpalib.component_control_circuit.de: A simple networkable microcontroller for coordinating an individual component.
item.mpalib.component_myofiber_gel.desc: A thick, conductive paste, perfect for fitting between myofibers in an artificial muscle."
An electrical, artificial muscle, with less range of movement than human muscle but orders of magnitude more strength.
item.mpalib.component_solar_panel.desc: A light sensitive device that will generate electricity from the sun.
item.mpalib.component_magnet.desc: A metallic device that generates a magnetic field which pulls items towards the player.
item.mpalib.component_computer_chip.desc: An upgraded control circuit that contains a CPU which is capable of more advanced calculations.
item.mpalib.component_rubber_hose.desc: A heavily insulated rubber hose capable of withstanding extreme heat or cold
